page.title: 17Newspaper Reporting
page.content: The following is an extract from the { {Wiltshire Gazette & Herald}for 6 June 1985, under the title Sutton Benger on the Village News page. {Church Fete } Sunshine and the hard work of the organisers made Saturday's Sutton Benger church fete a record breaking event. As well as the raffles and contests there were 25 stalls, with Sutton Benger Brownies running a special stall for children. The Wiltshire Radio goodies van was an additional attraction, and the crowds were entertained by the free-fall parachute team from RAF Lyneham. The record sum of Â£1,050 was raised.
